The Mindful Shopper

Best Beginner Hack

SAP iXp Hack4Good, hosted in October of 2020, was only my second hackathon since beginning to study software development. Fortunately, I was able to find a team of 4 that worked together across time zones to create a prize winning project. The Mindful Shopper is a Google Chrome extension that encourages sustainability in the era of online shopping by providing users with suggestions for items from second-hand and vintage retailers. Users can search for pieces through the extension directly, or view recommendations based on their current page while shopping on fast fashion sites such as H&M. Click here for The Mindful Shopperâ€™s full writeup on Devpost.

Created with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
